game.name: Tropico 4: Propaganda!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Tropico is invited to participate in the International Communist Propaganda competition! Turn the most absurd propaganda slogans into reality using the new Propaganda Tower building which suppresses protesters and converts citizens to loyalists, use the PR Specialist trait to brainwash your people a
